website_summaries.verdict: The combination of sun protection, soft skin and delicious fruity scent make Hempz a must have.
pros: We thought the fruity smell of Hempz set it apart from its other coconut-scented competition
It wears more like a moisturizer, so allow yourself time for the product to dry
Unlike some other brands, Hempz washes off easily in the shower, so you're not left with any oily residue

customer_reviews.title: Smells fanstastic but stays greasy!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells AMAZING. Really fresh and citrusy. The only thing I didn’t love about it was how greasy it left me for a while after application. Dry oils usually melt into the skin pretty easily but this one tends to stay on top of the skin. Still, a great product for moisturizing!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for FT Lauderdale sun
customer_reviews.text: Would’ve protected me from the sun if I reapplies frequently the first time. Instead I got lazy in the water and didn’t reapply the first day. I will say, i would’ve burned much worse if I didn’t apply this oil in the first place. Loved the smell and the quick absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Dreamy feel on your skin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love everything about this product; make sure you look at the related products from hempZ, I have most of them on AutoShip.... you should think about it, your skin will thank you
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dietz-Stein

customer_reviews.title: Strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product a lot, however, I was not anticipating the scent to be so strong. Most importantly, it does a good job as a sun screen
customer_reviews.author: B2

customer_reviews.title: Will not get you high. Will get you safe(r) from sun damage
customer_reviews.text: A lot to spread, which is great for a spray! Smells amazing. Be sure you get it everywhere, and don't leave it or you'll get really oily! LMAO
customer_reviews.author: Ash Sin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff and the scent is nice and fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Werner

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. It is not super waterproof but it’s great for lying on the beach. It smells great and your skin stays super moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: rosee

customer_reviews.title: not super greasy, pretty standard
customer_reviews.text: its good for easy reapplication, not a big fan of the formula, but i will use it. my fault for not reading the ingredient list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light spray...!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot because the spray is very light, so you don't get too much oil at once. Fragrance is mild and does not clash with your perfume.
customer_reviews.author: S  W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, easy to use, not difficult to remove, and does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Hempz
customer_reviews.text: I love this its simple to use it smells wonderful in is good for your skin I only use hempz in my skin feels amazing actually better then that. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Smock

customer_reviews.title: Very oily if sprayed too heavily
customer_reviews.text: I learned quickly that a little goes a long way with this moisturizer, or else it leaves your skin extremely oily. Once I figured out how much to use, I love it! The scent is light and tropical, which is perfect for summer. Because it has SPF 30, I use it as my sole sunscreen (reapplying often). I would have given it five stars were it not for how oily it can be.
customer_reviews.author: ToTheMax

customer_reviews.title: Love that Hempz Yuzu
customer_reviews.text: Good spray body oil. I like it, spray it on, smooth it out and skin feels soft. Sometimes the sprayer has to be cleaned because it stops spraying. Overall, I like this body oil a lot. I would recommend this and it's hard to find a body spray or lotion with SPF anymore. This has SPF 30.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Yasenchack

customer_reviews.title: Works and Smells great, messy
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and works great. Only issue is it leaks. Always afraid of the mess it’ll leave is the bottle falls to the side. Easy to apply!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Christensen

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is great. It smells really good
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is great. It smells really good. I happen to have insanely sensitive skin and i broke out in rashes after my second day of testing it. But that happens with every sunscreen or new product that i try. I wish I could use it!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the nice scent to this product. It provides a much needed hydration to my skin in the humid weather I live in.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the way it makes my skin feel so nice and soft. Love all the other lotions and lipgloss as well.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Epple

product_meta.title: Hempz Yuzu & Starfruit Daily Herbal Dry Oil Spray with SPF 30, 6.76 Ounce
product_meta.description: Hempz Yuzu and Starfruit Daily Herbal Moisturizing Dry Oil Body Spray with Broad Spectrum SPF 30 is a lightly scented weightless daily moisturizer that helps hydrate and protect skin from daily elements and UVA/UVB rays.
feature_bullets: Weightless daily moisturizer that helps hydrate, protect and improve skin's overall health and appearance
Enriched with 100% pure natural hemp seed oil and our signature citrus fruit complex
